description: Manual override for market indicators when automated data sources fail or are outdated.
instructions: Set 'enabled': true for any indicator you want to manually input. Enter 'value' and 'date' (YYYY-MM-DD format). System will use manual data if enabled and date is within 30 days.

shiller_pe.notes: Shiller P/E (CAPE) Ratio. Enter value like 30.5

fear_greed.notes: CNN Fear & Greed Index (0-100). Manually set to 59 per CNN website

buffett_us.notes: US Buffett Indicator (Total Market Cap / GDP as %)
